tr.td: The string sent from the server on connect. (ex: "SSH-2.0-OpenSSH_5.3p1 Debian-3ubuntu7 ")
The matched string from the banner_match regular expression specified during check creation. (ex: "SSH-2.0-OpenSSH_5.3p1 Debian-3ubuntu7 ")
The time took to finish executing the check in milliseconds. (ex: 10)
The time to connect measured in milliseconds. (ex: 0)
The time to first byte measured in milliseconds. (ex: 10)
